mdRecord.dcterms:title: Lemon-Brammer Cemetery, Little River Dist
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This Cemetery is located at the corner of Franklin Pike SE and Paradise Lane SE in a field on a hill overlooking Paradise Lane. Access is through a farm gate. on the right ,50 yards from the intersection. After going through the gate bear left up the slope 200 yards to a group of trees. The site is not fenced but is bordered by trees. The property owner is keeping the area mowed as a pasture. It is obvious that this was a large cemetery at one time. The ground is littered with what appears to be broken headstones and fieldstones. All but two are un. The two readable stones are under a large tree at the west end of the cemetery. N 36 55.618' W80 13.812'
